meta.videoTitle: Goals Toolkit: How to Set & Achieve Your Goals

title_en: Tool 9: Visual Target/Finish Line Training & Perceived Effort
title_zh: 工具9：视觉目标/终点线训练和感知付出

paragraphList.text_en: In pursuit of our goals, maintaining motivation and focus is crucial to success. To sustain effort throughout the process, it is essential to consider the specific time domain within which we are working. Tools and protocols play a key role in both initiating and sustaining our efforts, whether it be on a daily basis or over longer periods.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在追求我们的目标时，保持动力和专注对于成功至关重要。为了在整个过程中保持努力，考虑我们工作的特定时间范围至关重要。工具和协议在发起和维持我们的努力中起着关键作用，无论是每天还是在更长的时间段内。

paragraphList.text_en: Initiating your daily work involves assessing your motivation level. This can be done subjectively, such as asking yourself how motivated you feel on a scale from 1 to 10. Once you have determined your motivation level, you can take steps to increase it. Visualizing the end goal in a positive light can help boost motivation. On the other hand, if motivation is lacking, using visual targets or finish lines can help stimulate motivation and drive you to take action.
paragraphList.text_zh: 启动日常工作时需要评估你的动力水平。这可以主观地完成，比如问问自己从1到10级别上你感觉有多有动力。一旦确定了你的动力水平，你可以采取措施来增加动力。以积极的光芒展示最终目标可以帮助提升动力。另一方面，如果缺乏动力，使用视觉目标或终点线可以帮助激发动力并推动你采取行动。

paragraphList.text_en: Visual attention and focus are closely tied to our ability to maintain motivation and concentration. By narrowing or broadening our visual attention, we can influence our cognitive focus and overall readiness to perform tasks. When we narrow our visual attention and focus on a specific target, it triggers the release of neurochemicals that increase alertness and arousal, ultimately enhancing our motivation levels.
paragraphList.text_zh: 视觉注意力和专注与我们维持动机和集中力的能力密切相关。通过缩小或扩大我们的视觉注意力，我们可以影响我们的认知关注和整体准备进行任务的能力。当我们缩小视觉注意力并专注于特定目标时，会触发释放神经化学物质，增加警觉和唤醒，最终提高我们的动机水平。

paragraphList.text_en: Engaging in visual target training, where we focus on a specific point for a set period of time, has been shown to decrease perceived effort while improving performance. By concentrating on a goal line or specific target, individuals can complete tasks more efficiently and with less perceived effort. This practice can be incorporated into different activities, such as work or study sessions, to enhance focus and motivation.
paragraphList.text_zh: 参与视觉目标训练，专注于一个特定点一段时间，已被证明能够降低知觉努力，同时提高绩效。通过集中精力在一个目标线或特定目标上，个体能够更有效地完成任务，并感觉更轻松。这种实践可以融入不同的活动中，比如工作或学习过程，以增强注意力和动力。

paragraphList.text_en: It is important to note that visual target training is just one tool in a comprehensive approach to goal pursuit. Prioritizing factors such as good sleep, proper nutrition, and stress management are essential for optimal cognitive and physical performance. Visual target training should be viewed as a supplement to these foundational practices, enhancing the effectiveness of learning bouts and training sessions.
paragraphList.text_zh: 重要的是要注意，视觉目标训练只是全面追求目标方法中的一个工具。诸如良好的睡眠、适当的营养和压力管理等优先因素对于获得最佳认知和身体表现至关重要。视觉目标训练应被视为这些基础实践的补充，增强学习和训练过程的有效性。

paragraphList.text_en: Elevating blood pressure temporarily through visual target training is safe and can boost autonomic arousal, increasing motivation levels. However, it is advisable to take breaks and revert to panoramic vision or relaxation techniques to prevent eye strain and fatigue. By incorporating visual target training into goal pursuit efforts, individuals can enhance focus, maintain motivation, and achieve their objectives more efficiently.
paragraphList.text_zh: 提高血压通过视觉目标训练是安全的，并且可以增加自主神经兴奋，提高动力水平。然而，建议定期休息，转回全景视野或放松技巧，以防止眼部紧张和疲劳。通过将视觉目标训练纳入目标追求努力中，个人可以增强专注力，保持动力，并更有效地实现其目标。
